BATTLE_FINISHED: The battle has ended! The winner is player {winnerId}!
KNOCKOUT_BLOCK: {coffeemonName} is knocked out! You need to switch Coffeemon immediately.
STATUS_BLOCK: {coffeemonName} is affected by {effectType} and cannot move!
SWITCH_SUCCESS: {newActiveCoffeemonName} enters the battlefield ready to fight!
SWITCH_FAILED_SAME_COFFEEMON: This Coffeemon is already in battle!
SWITCH_FAILED_FAINTED_COFFEEMON: You cannot switch to a fainted Coffeemon!
ATTACK_MISS: {attackerName} tried to attack {targetName}, but the move missed!
ATTACK_CRIT: Critical hit! {attackerName} strikes with a devastating blow!
ATTACK_BLOCKED: {targetName} managed to block part of the attack!
COFFEEMON_FAINTED: {coffeemonName} has been defeated and can no longer fight!
STATUS_REFRESHED: The {effectType} effect on {targetName} has been refreshed!
